metadata.title: CVE-2022-48966 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: mvneta: Prevent out of bounds read in mvneta_config_rss()The pp->indir[0] value comes from the user.  It is passed to:	if (cpu_online(pp->rxq_def))inside the mvneta_percpu_elect() function.  It needs bounds checkedingto ensure that it is not beyond the end of the cpu bitmap.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
